item.title: Vengance help
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

In the case of the teleport you have to put…

LunarMagic(Vengance);

And btw it’s spelt vengeance.

Read full topic

item.title: Vengance help
item.dc:creator: @bobbob218 bobbob218
item.description:
@bobbob218 wrote:

Well I have it so you use the lvl 90 ancient tele to use vengance. I want it so vengance raises your str. I have the code but it doesn’t work… here it is.

[code]public void LunarMagic(String s) { // <33 0 R 3 0
if(s.equalsIgnoreCase(“Vengance”)) {
if(VenganceTimer < 30) {
VenganceTimer = 60;
txt4 = “Taste Vengeance!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(1979);
stillgfx(401, absX, absY);
}
else {
sendMessage(“You just used vengance you can’t use it again!”);
}
}
}

public void StrengthMagic(String s) {
if(s.equalsIgnoreCase(“RaiseStr”)) {
if(RaiseStr == 10) {
txt4 = “Taste vengance!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(1979);
Str3 = true;
strPot = true;
stillgfx(401, absX, absY);
RaiseStr = 100;
}
else {
sendMessage(“You just used vengance you can’t use it again!”);
}
}
}

public int RaiseStr = 10;
public int VenganceTimer = 0;
public String myClanName = “none”;
public int clanRights = 0;[/code]

Read full topic
